title: No HexTech after S- on janna
body: Today i logged on LoL and wanted a free win, so i thought as a supp main i should just play janna and I did and preformed slightly not braindead, any way, i got an s- but no chest, their is also no chest border around janna. Wtf rito i was told s- or above = free hextech chests. fix your game.

replies.body: **I am 99% sure you know this already**, but Imma throw this out there anyways. If you don't own Janna, then the chest won't be earned. And you can only earn a chest once.
i own janna and this was the very first time i got an s on her

Unfortunately, your account currently isn't eligible for chests.  :(  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can offer you more context privately!
did you have any chests available? you get 1 per week to a cap of 4.
